name: drillapi Codespace
postCreateCommand: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then python -m pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then python -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt; fi && python -m pre_commit install || true
postStartCommand: nohup uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 > /tmp/uvicorn.log 2>&1 & echo 'uvicorn started, logs at /tmp/uvicorn.log'
